definition: successfull complete/ clarify/ figure out
examples: We need to nail down the details of this project!

definition: very careful and precise
examples: She is meticulous about her work

definition: delay or postpone action
examples: Stop procrastinating and start studying

definition: become exhausted or lose motivation
examples: Working 80 hours a week will make you burn out quickly

definition: try something; attempt to do something
examples: I've never played tennis before, but I'll give it a shot

definition: depend on something; wait for something
examples: The success of this project hangs on getting approval

word: bite off more than one can chew
definition: take on more responsibility than one can handle
examples: Taking five courses this semester was biting off more than I could chew

definition: learn how to do something; become skilled at something
examples: It took me a while to get the hang of using this software

definition: find or discover something by accident
examples: I stumbled across this amazing restaurant while exploring the city

definition: search for information; find details about something
examples: Let me look up the meaning of this word in the dictionary

definition: use up all of something; have none left
examples: We ran out of milk, so I need to go to the store

definition: remain as a threat or problem; linger unresolved
examples: The deadline is hanging over me like a dark cloud

definition: the practice of pushing dangerous situations to the limit
examples: The negotiation involved political brinkmanship between the two countries

definition: cause someone to feel upset or annoyed
examples: I didn't mean to offend you with my comment

definition: general aspect of happiness, including financial, relationship, religion
examples: Which country is the most flourishing country in the world?

definition: small things of something good or precious
examples: a nugget of wisdom

definition: enjoy things by experiencing it slowly and mindfully, or enjoy good moment
examples: Take time to savour the beautiful sunset

definition: thankful to what you have
examples: She expressed her gratitude for all the help she received

definition: minor achievement or success
examples: Celebrating small wins can boost your motivation

definition: the journey of thousand miles starts with a single step
examples: Remember, 千里之行始于足下 - every great achievement begins with taking the first step

definition: a word fashionable and much used
examples: Artificial intelligence has become a buzzword in the tech industry
